authorize.title: Application "{name}" is requesting the following permissions:
authorize.permissions.token.title: MtF ID identifier
authorize.permissions.token.describe: The identifier of your account's MtF ID, which is used to identify you.
authorize.permissions.profile.title: Account infomation
authorize.permissions.profile.describe: Information of your account, including but not limited to avatar, nickname, etc.
authorize.permissions.email.title: Email
authorize.permissions.email.describe: Email on your account, can be used to send you emails.
authorize.permissions.phone.title: Phone number
authorize.permissions.phone.describe: Phone number on your account, can be used to call you or send you SNS.
authorize.permissions.address.title: Address
authorize.permissions.unknow.title: Unknown permission
error.title: Error!
finish.title: Finish!
finish.signup.tip: Account created successfully! Now we're redirecting you to the login page...
